programme.title: Euthanasia and the terminally ill
programme.short_synopsis: Should the terminally be helped to die, and the trials of doctors who have done so.
programme.medium_synopsis: Euthanasia, and the right to die for the terminally ill, the case of Karen Ann Quinlan, and Dr Jack Kevorkian, the Michigan doctor who has helped 27 dying people.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
